product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Parang II Machete
long_description: A modern take on the classic jungle tool, the Gerber Bear Grylls Parang II machete is lightweight, sharp and perfectly balanced--perfect for clearing a path or taking on other chopping tasks.
short_description: A modern take on the classic jungle tool, the Gerber Bear Grylls Parang II machete is lightweight, sharp and perfectly balanced--perfect for clearing a path or taking on other chopping tasks.
